title: Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season - Zankoku Douwa: Utsukushi-hime

synonyms: Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season Episode 6.5
alternative_titles.en: Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season  - A Cruel Fairy Tale: The Beautiful Princess
alternative_titles.ja: 残酷童話 うつくし姫

synopsis:
Episode 6.5 of Monogatari Series: Off & Monster Season, adapting the short story A Cruel Fairy Tale: The Beautiful Princess.

Once upon a time, there was a true story that happened about 600 years ago. It's a story of a very beautiful girl who lived in a country that no longer exists.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
